problem.p: As the height of a funicular form, h, increases what happens to the load that may be applied? Assume that the other dimensions and the allowable force in the cable remains the same.

choicegroup.label: As the height of a funicular form, h, increases what happens to the load that may be applied? Assume that the other dimensions and the allowable force in the cable remains the same.
choicegroup.choice: the load that may be applied increases
the load that may be applied decreases
The load that may be applied remains the same
